title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Pre-Service Science Teacher Education Using Chatbot-Based 5E Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science curriculum content knowledge and general pedagogical theories
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Preservice teachers create instructional designs that apply each phase of the 5E Learning Model (Engage, Explore, Explain, Elaborate, Evaluate) to science lessons.
Using a chatbot system, learners self-diagnose theoretical errors occurring in the instructional design process with over 80% accuracy.
Learners derive at least three improvement points for instructional design by comparatively analyzing peer feedback and chatbot feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
